release dates: USA::24 April 2013                            (New York City, New York)
imdb.plot outline: The burning issues impacting the new age of Information Communication and Technology in the Caribbean will be explored and discussed via interactive community forums, workshops and exhibitions hosted by the Caribbean Telecommunications Union (CTU).
imdb.title: Caribbean ICT Roadshow
plot: The burning issues impacting the new age of Information Communication and Technology in the Caribbean will be explored and discussed via interactive community forums, workshops and exhibitions hosted by the Caribbean Telecommunications Union (CTU).::Jeanille Bonterre
